snippets.name: Single Job View Template
snippets.code:
/** * Single Job View Template * Add this to Code Snippets plugin * Use this template for single job posts or create a custom template file */ // Hook to handle single job display add_filter('single_template', 'jobmatch_single_job_template'); function jobmatch_single_job_template($single_template) { global $post; if ($post->post_type === 'jobs') { // Check if theme has a single-jobs.php template $theme_template = locate_template('single-jobs.php'); if ($theme_template) { return $theme_template; } // Otherwise use our custom display add_filter('the_content', 'jobmatch_render_single_job_content', 1); } return $single_template; } // Render single job content function jobmatch_render_single_job_content($content) { global $post; if (!is_single() || $post->post_type !== 'jobs') { return $content; } // Track job view jobmatch_track_job_view($post->ID); // Get current user info $current_user_id = get_current_user_id(); $user_role = $current_user_id ? get_user_meta($current_user_id, 'user_role', true) : ''; // Get job data $company_id = $post->post_author; $company_profile = jobmatch_get_anonymous_profile($company_id, $current_user_id); // Get job meta data $work_type = get_post_meta($post->ID, 'work_type', true); $experience_level = get_post_meta($post->ID, 'required_experience', true); $salary_min = get_post_meta($post->ID, 'salary_min', true); $salary_max = get_post_meta($post->ID, 'salary_max', true); $work_arrangement = get_post_meta($post->ID, 'work_arrangement', true); $job_location = get_post_meta($post->ID, 'job_location', true); $requirements = get_post_meta($post->ID, 'requirements', true); $nice_to_have = get_post_meta($post->ID, 'nice_to_have', true); $benefits = get_post_meta($post->ID, 'benefits', true) ?: array(); $application_deadline = get_post_meta($post->ID, 'application_deadline', true); $application_requirements = get_post_meta($post->ID, 'application_requirements', true) ?: array(); $culture_preferences = get_post_meta($post->ID, 'culture_preferences', true) ?: array(); $job_views = get_post_meta($post->ID, 'job_views', true) ?: 0; // Get tech stack $tech_skills = wp_get_post_terms($post->ID, 'tech_stack', array('fields' => 'names')); // Get match score if developer is logged in $match_score = null; $match_status = 'none'; if ($current_user_id && $user_role === 'developer') { $match_score = jobmatch_get_match_score($current_user_id, $post->ID, 'job'); $match_status = jobmatch_get_job_match_status($current_user_id, $post->ID, $company_id); } // Get application count $applications = jobmatch_get_job_applications($post->ID); $application_count = count($applications); ob_start(); ?>

get_row($wpdb->prepare(" SELECT p.*, pm_status.meta_value as match_status FROM {$wpdb->posts} p LEFT JOIN {$wpdb->postmeta} pm_status ON p.ID = pm_status.post_id AND pm_status.meta_key = 'match_status' LEFT JOIN {$wpdb->postmeta} pm_job ON p.ID = pm_job.post_id AND pm_job.meta_key = 'job_id' LEFT JOIN {$wpdb->postmeta} pm_dev ON p.ID = pm_dev.post_id AND pm_dev.meta_key = 'developer_id' LEFT JOIN {$wpdb->postmeta} pm_comp ON p.ID = pm_comp.post_id AND pm_comp.meta_key = 'company_id' WHERE p.post_type = 'matches' AND p.post_status = 'publish' AND pm_job.meta_value = %s AND pm_dev.meta_value = %s AND pm_comp.meta_value = %s ", $job_id, $developer_id, $company_id)); if (!$match) { return 'none'; } if (in_array($match->match_status, array('mutual', 'revealed', 'chatting'))) { return array('status' => 'mutual', 'match_id' => $match->ID); } if ($match->match_status === 'developer_liked') { return 'liked'; } if ($match->match_status === 'passed') { return 'passed'; } return 'none'; } // Render related jobs function jobmatch_render_related_jobs($current_job_id, $tech_skills, $company_id, $limit = 3) { // Get similar jobs based on tech stack $args = array( 'post_type' => 'jobs', 'post_status' => 'publish', 'posts_per_page' => $limit, 'post__not_in' => array($current_job_id), 'tax_query' => array( array( 'taxonomy' => 'tech_stack', 'field' => 'name', 'terms' => $tech_skills, 'operator' => 'IN' ) ) ); $related_jobs = get_posts($args); if (empty($related_jobs)) { // If no jobs with matching tech, get recent jobs $args = array( 'post_type' => 'jobs', 'post_status' => 'publish', 'posts_per_page' => $limit, 'post__not_in' => array($current_job_id), 'orderby' => 'date', 'order' => 'DESC' ); $related_jobs = get_posts($args); } ob_start(); ?>
